headline: Letter: Lima News advocates for criminal behavior
sentences:
3515 Elida Road
Lima, OH 45807
A big, fat thorn to The Lima News for its Feb. 27, less than Holy Sunday morning “thorning” of those folks calling for enforcement of constitutional law as written in the 14th Amendment, which specifically and pointedly prohibits “a member of Congress” from holding office after engaging in “insurrection or rebellion” or “giving aid or comfort to enemies thereof.”
That is present law!

Like it or not, whether neighbors, friends, promoters of your pet interests or pleasing the prejudices of your corporate bosses, those who violate it are “outlaws” and criminals and, if not placed behind bars, should play no part in governing this nation.

This newspaper’s editorial staff is showing a cowardly, abject disdain for the American system of justice when it encourages placing Jim Jordan above the law, thus promoting a corruption of our system of government — to put it kindly.
